name: test_e2e_with_logs[520_CRLF_ENC_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_ENC_005` |
| **Name** | Double URL-Encoded CRLF Injection |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | encoded_crlf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `Double URL-encoded CRLF with header injection`
- **Encoded**: `%250d%250aInjected-Header%3Atrue`

## Test Execution Results

- **Latency**: ~3000ms

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
